abstract: Fremont Country, Colo, District Atty Thom LeDoux says over 100 students involved in sexting scandal will not face criminal charges, citing lack of evidence of adult involvement, coercion, bullying or dissemination of pictures on Internet.
lead_paragraph: More than 100 students involved in a sexting scandal at Cañon City High School will not face criminal charges, a prosecutor announced Wednesday.

headline.main: Colorado: No Charges for Students in Sexting Case
headline.print_headline: Colorado: No Charges for Students in Sexting Case

snippet: More than 100 students involved in a sexting scandal at Cañon City High School will not face criminal charges, a prosecutor announced Wednesday.
